# kops_volume_spec

| attribute | type | optional/required | computed |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `delete_on_termination` | Bool | Optional |  |
| `device` | String | Required |  |
| `encrypted` | Bool | Optional |  |
| `iops` | Int | Optional |  |
| `size` | Int | Optional |  |
| `type` | String | Optional |  |
